description: Make the perfect summer sauce with this chilli and mango salsa recipe. Pair it with fish, chicken or salads for a juicy flavour hit. It's a great Christmas gift too.
keywords: Hot sauce,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Christmas,Wheat free,Soy free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Dec 2020,Mango,Low fat,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Mango Hot Sauce Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 mango, peeled, cheeks removed and roughly chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Place mango, capsicum, chillies, garlic, white wine vinegar, caster sugar and cayenne pepper in a saucepan over high heat. Cook for 20 minutes or until thickened slightly. Transfer to a blender and blend until smooth. Store in a sterilised glass jar or an airtight container in the fridge for up to two weeks.
